title: Artificial Waves
text:
Artificial Waves are a Russian post-rock band formed in Zelenograd, Moscow in 2012. The band consists of Alexey Pereverzev, Arthur Kudrov, Dmitry Kaleev, and Ilya Kosharov - all of whom hold full-time jobs in engineering, computer science, and research.


== Band members ==
Alexey Pereverzev – guitar, keyboards, samples
Arthur Kudrov – guitar
Dmitry Kaleev – bass
Ilya Kosharov – drums


== Discography ==


=== Studio Albums ===
Changes (released 30 June 2014)
Heavy. Deep. Sad. Ironic. (released 21 September 2016)
The Complexity of Simple (released 29 November 2019)
Fragile (released 23 January 2023)


=== Live Albums ===
Studio Live Session (released 12 November 2012)


=== Extended Plays ===
Initial Link (released 24 March 2013)


=== Singles ===
